interpretation:
The "plunger" card represents the need to dive deep into a situation and uncover the root of the problem. It suggests that the querent may need to get their hands dirty and take action to clear away any blockages or obstacles in their path. This card also signifies the importance of persistence and determination, as the act of plunging requires a continuous and steady effort to achieve the desired result.

Associated keywords for this card include: unclogging, clearing, unblocking, persistence, determination, action.

When this card appears in a reading, it may indicate that the querent needs to take a more active role in resolving a difficult situation. It may also suggest that the solution to a problem may require a more unconventional approach or a willingness to confront uncomfortable truths. Ultimately, the "plunger" card encourages the querent to be bold and persistent in their efforts to overcome any obstacles in their path.
